name: 專題討論（一）
description: 本課程可培養學生研究能力與口頭表達能力。前期每週兩位同學每人報告一篇原著論文，可瞭解如何搜尋資料，產生研究題目與構想，並經由閱讀論文瞭解如何設計研究，進行研究，結果分析與討論；後十週每週一位同學報告回顧型論文，可瞭解如何整理過去研究，有條理分類、循序漸進並符合邏輯推演。
goals: Expose students to advanced research topics in nutrition science.
Provide students trainings in communicating science critically and effectively
Provide students trainings in domestic and global visions
Provide students trainings in science research ethics
syllabus:
**課程簡介** **_COURSE DESCRIPTION_**

學習具備查詢、獲得、及閱讀營養科學及生物醫學相關文獻之能力。

This graduate course provides a forum for students to make public presentations to an audience and to address the analytic and professional skills required to critique original research publications in a wide variety of journals related to the field of nutritional sciences. Students are also required to participate in the seminars presented by other students.
